meta.description: Over 1,000 studies were published in peer-reviewed medical journals documenting the risks of the COVID vaccines.

title: 'Over 1,000 Studies Published in Peer-Reviewed Medical Journals Say the Vaccines Are Dangerous' – Steve Kirsch
cleaned_text:
But the CDC says the vaccines are safe and effective and there is nothing to worry about. Seriously?

Here's a link to over 1,000 studies published in peer-reviewed medical journals documenting the risks of the COVID vaccines.

Hmmm…. Shouldn't these be part of informed consent?

If you have any blue pillers who you are trying to persuade, ask them if they've read any of the studies and have them explain to you why you shouldn't be concerned.

opengraph.title: 'Over 1,000 Studies Published in Peer-Reviewed Medical Journals Say the Vaccines Are Dangerous' – Steve Kirsch
